Ọ bụbụ onye ịsị ọba Akwụkwọ mba/ Onye ịsị oche nke National Library of Nịajịrịa (NLN) Abuja.
Ọ bụbu onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ọbá akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Ibadan n'etiti afọ 1976 na 1978

Prọfesọ bụ Prọfesụ nke Ọbá Akwụkwọ na Ozi Sayensị na Mahadum Ilorin, Naịjirịa na Mahadim Botswana n'otu n'otu.Na mgbakwunye, Prọfesọ Aina bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke African Journal of Library, Archives and Information Science, naanị otu ọbá akwụkwọ na ozi sayensị na Africa nke Web of Science Uwa kwadoro n'echekwaba
Mmasị nyocha ya gafere mpaghara niile nke ọbá akwụkwọ na ozi sayensị
Nke a na-ekwu maka ọtutu ihe na njide ya na ọrụ ọ họọrọ.
Prọfesọ Aina nwetara nzere bachelọ na Chemistry na Mahadum Lagos,1974; diplọma postgraduate na Librarianship, Mahadum Ibadan, 1976 na M.Phil
na ozi sayensị, Mahadum City, London,1980.N'afọ 1986, ọ nwetara PhD na ịmụ ihe ọba akwụkwọ, site na Mahadum Ibadan, Ibadan.
Prọfesọ Lenrie Olatokunbo Aina bụ onye otu na Ibe Naịjrịan Library Association; Onye otu, American Library Association na Onye otu, Institute of Information Scientists.
